sentence.Network_en: He is remanded on his own recognizance of $ 4,000.
sentence.Network_cn: 在保证付款4,000美元后他被还押(以后再出庭).

sentence.Network_en: This Recognizance has same law duty as the work contract.
sentence.Network_cn: 本保证书与《劳务用工合同》具有同等法律约束力.

sentence.Network_en: He was granted bail on his own recognizance of $ 1,000.
sentence.Network_cn: 他自己付了1000美元的保释金后获释.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French reconnissance, from reconnaistre 'recognize'

means.word_mean: 1. (law) a security entered into before a court with a condition to perform some act required by law; on failure to perform that act a sum is forfeited
